org.agilej.sparkle

Interface Session

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionFacade

    public interface Session
    interface for presenting a server side session

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T get(String name)
      get data from session with given name
      String id()
      session id
      Session set(String name, Object value)
      set value to session with given name

    • Method Detail

      • set

        Session set(String name,
            Object value)
        set value to session with given name
        Parameters:
        name - name of the value
        value - the value will set to session
        Returns:
        session itself

      • get

        <T> T get(String name)
        get data from session with given name
        Parameters:
        name - value's name in session
        Returns:
        value in session, null if not exist

      • id

        String id()
        session id
        Returns:
        id of this session
